name: ` Hipster Weight Lifting: Tiny Meat Head Battle Competition Games
name_original: ` Hipster Weight Lifting: Tiny Meat Head Battle Competition Games
description:
CROSSFIT!!!! Get your bearded hipster pump on. This fun game will make you wish you were doin burpees and throwin' kettle balls. This game fun for laughs and simple to play!

Just lift those weights and let your hipster reach those high scores. Tap those barbells as fast as you can. Don't strain a finger though ;)

Awesome features:
- Simple and fun to play
- Leaderboards for you and your friends
- Share your score through social media

So download the game now and start pumping that iron! CROSSFIT!!!!!! :P
